summary: The module provides lightweight dummy utilities for constructing mock configurations and model components, and defines both fast unit tests and comprehensive integration tests that validate the Kandinsky V2.2 text‑to‑image diffusion pipeline, ensuring correct execution, deterministic behavior, and proper image generation from prompts.
business_intent: Guarantee the reliability and quality of the Kandinsky V2.2 AI image generation pipeline before release by detecting regressions and confirming that the end‑to‑end workflow produces expected results across environments.
